text: Avarannu kharidisidda ijipt‌na vyakti tanna patniyodane ‘‘avanige gauravada satkara nidu. Namage avanu labhavannu tarabahudu athava navu avananne putranagisikollabahudu’’ endanu. I riti navu yusuph‌rige ghatanegalannu vyakhyanisuva vidyeyannu kalisalikkagi avarige bhumiyallondu neleyannu odagisidevu. Allahanu tanna ella vyavaharagala melu purna prabalya hondiruttane. Adare manavaralli heccinavaru ballavaralla
